trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnecting"></xref> event or <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnecting"></xref> event of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Representerar den metod som hanterar den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnecting"> </xref> händelse eller <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnecting"> </xref> händelsen för en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref> kontroll.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnecting> event is raised by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartsConnecting%2A> method, and it signals that the connection process has begun (for example, a user has selected a control and clicked a connect verb), but is not yet completed.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnecting>händelse utlöses av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartsConnecting%2A>metod, och signalerar att anslutningen har börjat (till exempel en användare har valt en kontroll och klickat på ett connect-verb), men ännu inte har slutförts.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartsConnecting%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnecting>

trans-unit.source: The event provides an opportunity to cancel a connection before it is complete.
trans-unit.target: Händelsen ger en möjlighet att avbryta en anslutning innan den är klar.

trans-unit.source: If the connection is successfully completed, this event is followed by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnected> event.
trans-unit.target: Om anslutningen är slutfört den här händelsen är följt av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnected>händelse.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnected>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnecting> event is raised by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartsDisconnecting%2A> method, and it signals the fact that a user has clicked a disconnect verb, or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisconnectWebParts%2A> method has otherwise been called.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnecting>händelse utlöses av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartsDisconnecting%2A>metod och signalerar till faktumet att användaren har klickat på ett disconnect-verb eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisconnectWebParts%2A>annars metoden har anropats.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisconnectWebParts%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartsDisconnecting%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnecting>

trans-unit.source: The event provides an opportunity to cancel the process of ending a connection before it is complete.
trans-unit.target: Händelsen ger en möjlighet att avbryta processen för att avsluta en anslutning innan den är klar.

trans-unit.source: If the connection is ended successfully, this event is followed by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnected> event.
trans-unit.target: Om anslutningen är har uppnått den här händelsen är följt av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnected>händelse.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnected>

trans-unit.source: The method specified in the WebPartConnectionsCancelEventHandler delegate is called when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnecting> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnecting> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: Den metod som anges i WebPartConnectionsCancelEventHandler delegaten anropas när en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnecting>eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnecting>händelsen utlöses.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnecting> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnecting>

trans-unit.source: Page developers can add custom handlers for the events by adding the `OnWebPartsDisconnecting` and `OnWebPartsConnecting` attributes to the `<asp:webpartmanager>` element, and assigning custom method names to the attributes.
trans-unit.target: Sidan utvecklare kan lägga till egna hanterare för händelser genom att lägga till den `OnWebPartsDisconnecting` och `OnWebPartsConnecting` attribut till den `<asp:webpartmanager>` element och tilldela anpassade metodnamn attribut.

trans-unit.source: A custom handler can also be assigned programmatically.
trans-unit.target: En anpassad hanterare kan också tilldelas programmässigt.

trans-unit.source: For more information on programmatically assigning an event handler, see [NIB: How to: Connect Event Handler Methods to Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/348e9600-22e3-49a2-8864-11c5bb3e98fc).
trans-unit.target: Mer information om hur du tilldelar en händelsehanterare programmässigt finns [NIB: hur du: ansluta hanterare händelsemetoder händelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/348e9600-22e3-49a2-8864-11c5bb3e98fc).
